smac.util

Class SmacConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.util.SmacConfigReader

  • public class SmacConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The SmacConfigReader class reads and parses the SMAC module configuration file.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
